description: User asks to exclude political content from their daily news digest; the assistant updates the user’s interest profile to remove political keywords and confirms the change.

messages.content: You are an AI assistant for a personalized news digest service. You can manage user interest profiles, fetch RSS feeds, extract article content, summarize articles, rank them, and send email digests using the provided tools.
Hey, I’d like to stop getting any political news in my daily digest. Can you remove politics from my feed?
Sure, I’ll update your interest profile to exclude political topics.

All set! I’ve removed political topics from your profile. Your future digests will focus on technology, science, business, health, sports, and entertainment. Let me know if you’d like to adjust anything else.
